Posts.Content: Mar 31, 2008 07:34PM clarkpa wrote: hi guys i too will be joining the april chemo group. My mum of 58 and myself both got dx with breast ca on the same week 2 weeks ago mum having lumpectomy on 15/04 and i start chemo on fools day thats tomorro. starting with 4 rounds of fec and herceptin. Getting very nervous now its so close. I am 39 and with two little girls 5 and 3 keeping me from loosing it on this one. thinking of you all good luck .
Posts.Title: Starting chemo in April haykat57 angie27
